jrpp207 just copy activision folder from game to wrapper: contents/resources/transgaming/c_drive/Program files or Programme

Ok everything is working fine, except for some "DirectX errors" that make the game quit. So far, mission 2 and 5 aren't playable. But jeez, the other one ROCK
If you're stuck because of these error just select the next mission

Step 2 :
The .rar contains a "Modern Warfare 2 CXZ Black Diamond Wrapper.dmg.zip"
Unzip it, mount the disc image.
In this disc image, you have the wrapper and the "extra" file that will help you for the further steps ( or not )

Take the files from your original game contents to the wrapper ( as it said in the help )
